title: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver, Power Tool Combo Kit with 2 Batteries and Charger, Yellow/Black (DCK240C2)
descriptions:
Product name: DEWALT 20V MAX Cordless Drill and Impact Driver Combo Kit (Model DCK240C2), Yellow/Black.

This kit is two tools with power supply. It includes:
- DCD771 20V MAX 1/2-inch Drill/Driver
- DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver
- Two 20V Lithium-Ion batteries
- One charger

About the DCD771 Drill/Driver:
- Two speed ranges: 0–450 RPM and 0–1500 RPM
- Power: 300 UWO (unit watts out)
- 1/2-inch single sleeve ratcheting chuck holds bits tight
- Compact and lightweight design for small spaces
- Ergonomic handle for better comfort and control

About the DCF885 Impact Driver:
- Length: 5.55 inches front to back
- Weight: 2.8 lbs
- 1/4-inch hex chuck, 1-handed loading, accepts 1-inch bit tips
- LED light ring with 3 LEDs, 20-second delay to see work area with less shadow
- Compact and lightweight design

Additional features:
- LED foot light gives superior visibility when working
- Color: Yellow/Black
- Charger included, batteries included (2 pcs)

Use:
- Suitable for many home and job tasks like drilling holes, driving screws, assembling furniture, light construction, and repair work.
- Good for tight spaces and working in dark areas due to LED lights.

Package contents:
- 1x DCD771 20V MAX 1/2-inch Drill/Driver
- 1x DCF885 1/4-inch Impact Driver
- 2x 20V Lithium-Ion Batteries
- 1x Charger

Note:
- Tools are cordless and use the same 20V MAX battery platform.
- Designed for reliable performance with easy handling for daily work.
